resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106988</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106988</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205378</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Fine Art of Collecting: John Held Jr.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die feine kunst des Sammelns: John Hielt Jr 
An.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'art fin du rassemblement : John A tenu Jr.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A arte fina da coleta: John Prendeu Jr.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arte fine di raccolta: John Ha tenuto Jr.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η λεπτή τέχνη της συλλογής: Jr John 
Held.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El arte fino de recoger: Juan Sostuvo Jr.</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">SPARK spends the day with pioneering Mail Art collector John Held Jr. as he continues to build his collection, one piece at a time. This Educator Guide explores the history and many forms of Mail art and stamps.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">FUNKEN verbringt den Tag mit dem Vorangehen mit 
Post-kunstkollektor, den John jr., wie er fortfährt, seine Ansammlung
aufzubauen, Einteiler hintereinander anhielt. Diese 
Erzieher-Anleitung erforscht die Geschichte und viele Formulare der 
Postkunst und stempelt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'ÉTINCELLE passe le jour avec frayer un chemin le 
collecteur d'art de courrier que John a tenu le Jr. comme il continue 
à établir sa collection, une seule pièce à la fois. Ce guide
d'éducateur explore l'histoire et beaucoup de formes d'art de 
courrier et emboutit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A FAÍSCA gasta o dia com abrir caminho o coletor que da 
arte do correio John prendeu o Jr. enquanto continua a construir sua 
coleção, uma parte de cada vez. Esta guia do educador explora 
o history e muitos formulários da arte do correio e carimba-os.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La SCINTILLA spende il giorno con il pionierismo 
del collettore che John ha tenuto il Jr. come continua a sviluppare la
sua accumulazione, un pezzo solo di arte della posta alla volta. 
Questa guida dell'educatore esplora la storia e molte forme 
dell'arte della posta e timbra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ΣΠΙΝΘΗΡΑΣ περνά την ημέρα με την πρωτοποριακή 
νεώτερο John Held συλλεκτών τέχνης ταχυδρομείου δεδομένου 
ότι συνεχίζει να χτίζει τη συλλογή του, ένα κομμάτι σε έναν 
χρόνο. Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών ερευνά την ιστορία και
πολλές μορφές της τέχνης και των γραμματοσήμων ταχυδρομείου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La CHISPA pasa el día con iniciar el colector que Juan 
sostuvo a Jr. a medida que él continúa construyendo su colección, 
una sola pieza del arte del correo al mismo tiempo. Esta guía 
del educador explora la historia y muchas formas de arte del correo y 
estampa.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205378</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0

FN:OERCommons

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106988</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-fine-art-of-collecting-john-held-jr</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
